```lisp
[
(:action move
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?from - location ?to - location ?context - context)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?entity ?from) 
        (connected ?from ?context ?to) 
        (not (blocked ?from ?context ?to))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (at ?entity ?to) 
        (not (at ?entity ?from))
    )
),

(:action board
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?platform - location ?vehicle - vehicle)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?entity ?platform) 
        (at ?vehicle ?platform) 
        (solid_platform ?platform) 
        (not (in ?entity ?vehicle))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (in ?entity ?vehicle) 
        (not (at ?entity ?platform))
    )
),

(:action hold
    :parameters (?passenger - entity ?boat - vehicle ?rail - rail ?dock - location ?other_passenger - entity)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?passenger ?dock) 
        (in ?passenger ?boat) 
        (has_rails ?boat) 
        (boarding ?other_passenger ?boat)
        (not (holding ?passenger ?rail))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (holding ?passenger ?rail) 
        (steady ?boat) 
        (not (rocking ?boat))
    )
)
]
```
